title: Update Visit Our Store map embed and add Google Maps link CTA

requirements.summary: Make the “Visit Our Store” section’s embedded map match the provided Google Maps location and add a visible CTA that opens the exact Google Maps URL in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: The “Visit Our Store” section provides a clearly visible call-to-action (button or text link) that opens https://maps.app.goo.gl/TkMaKv9cUV83vhFXA in a new tab (uses target="_blank" with rel="noopener noreferrer").
The embedded map shown in the iframe is updated (if feasible) to display the same store location as the provided Google Maps link, rather than a generic Korba map view.
All user-facing text added for this change is in English.

file_operations.description: In the “Visit Our Store” section: (1) replace the current generic Korba iframe src with an embed URL that resolves to the same store location as https://maps.app.goo.gl/TkMaKv9cUV83vhFXA (use Google Maps’ share/embed flow to obtain the correct embed URL), and (2) add a clearly visible CTA in the map section that opens https://maps.app.goo.gl/TkMaKv9cUV83vhFXA in a new tab using target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer". Use the shadcn-ui Button component for the CTA styling/consistency (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing). Ensure any added label text is English.
